title: Pick your side - Fire vs. Ice

Yeah, it just occurred to me before, if Teemo wins the new skin vote, and Fire Team wins all stars, they might make an Infernal Teemo skin or something {{champion:17}}

{{champion:74}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:17}}
** i really want them!!!**
Can please You make permanent finishers for next season? Be so awesome, even if its for rank only showing your rank, just a thought.
When they literally use the champion based around fire for the ice team xD
Yeah, I thought I'd do some switcharoos. :D Other considerations were the ice annie and ice brand skins.

Did anyone else vote in champs that had an Ice or Fire theme/had Ice or Fire themed skins?

I voted thus, hoping for a themed matchup and assuming players had a choice of all skins:

**Fire:**

Top: (Infernal) Nasus
Mid: (Firefox) Ahri
ADC: (Phoenix) Quinn
Supp: (Dragonslayer) Braum
Jun: (Shadowfire) Kindred

**Ice:**

Top: (Ice Drake) Shyvana
Mid: (Tundra) Fizz
ADC: (Freylord or Classic) Ashe
Supp: (Frost Queen) Janna
Jun: (Frozen Terror) Nocturne

There was a lot of champs to choose from, especially top lane choices :)
